replies.msg: 基隆廟口係夜市黎

I work in JS Hotel Taipei. My friend came to stay for a night as company for me while my colleagues are away. (when I'm in a hotel room I usually have thr television on for company till I go to bed) My friend alex has received a commission for a sculpture, a sketch, an oil painting and an article on picasso from the hotel. i offer heartfelt congratulations to him for having got a commission to make a sculpture, do a sketch, paint an oil painting and write an article on picasso since it's a once in a lifetime opportunity. I've always admired the exquisite colors of oil paintings be it a portrait or landscape. His palette consists of blues greens and browns whereas his former classmate who's also a painter paints from a palette consisting of reds whites and oranges. A palette, a set of paintbrushes and paints normally cost around three thousand dollars altogether. A colleague of mine has recently been promoted and assigned to the Paris office with which she's very pleased. I'm really pleased about her promotion too.

my friend Matt lives in Taiwan. He says there was a bully in his class at university. i told him not to engage with him. Just stay out of his way as much as possible. He's also a secondary school teacher. Many students today learn violin, piano, Judi and dancing. I honestly dont know how they juggle these activities as they have to spend time practicing each of them. Perhaps their oatents want to kindle their interests and see which one they can cultivate an interest in ot have a talent for
